name: Flatworlds
description:
Flatworlds is a game about exploring randomly generated worlds in an attempt to mix the various things you find. This creates new ways to interact with the worlds around you.

HOW TO PLAY:

MOVEMENT <-> WASD

 ACTION <-> SPACEBAR

 SWITCH ACTION TO HARVESTING <-> Q

 SWITCH ACTION TO PLACING <-> E

  <-> R

 SWITCH ACTION TO FUSING <-> F

 AIMING WHILE IN FUSING OR PLACING <-> MOUSE

 TELEPORT SHIP TO MOUSE <-> T

 TOGGLE CONTROLS <-> C


FUSING:

HIT F TO START FUSING WHILE ON FOOT

YOU WILL BE FUSING THE SELECTED SLOT WITH WHAT THE MOUSE IS HOVERING OVER

HIT SPACE TO ATTEMPT FUSION 

A SUCCESS WILL RESULT IN A NEW ITEM BEING ADDED TO INVENTORY
